snippet.title: Twitter tells third-party devs to stop making Twitter client apps
snippet.description: ...In a statement issued today by Twitter on its official developer mailing list, the company informed third-party developers that they should no longer attempt to build conventional Twitter client applications. snippet.title: Game industry to writers: embargos include Twitter
snippet.description: ...You can learn much about the game industryboth the industry side and the job of reporting on itfrom following the right people on Twitter. The rules for what game writers can and can't say aren't exactly clear, although at a recent press event the embargo was made explicit for those attending: you're not allowed to Twitter about what you've just seen.While it's not exactl...

snippet.title: Twitter launching annotation feature, streaming API
snippet.description: ...Twitter, the popular micro-messaging service, is preparing to launch several new features for end users and third-party application developers. Twitter is moving into new territory with a richer real-time streaming API and an annotation system that will make it possible for developers to piggy-back additional data on top of tweets.These new features were announced at Chirp, an official Twitter de...
